fillFormToBookDormitory: Fill out the form below to book your selected dormitory.
selectBothStartAndEndDates: Please select both start and end dates for your booking.
invalidDateRange: End date cannot be before start date.
enterEmployer: Enter your employer or organization name
dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Your request has been received and is pending approval. To secure your booking, please make payment to the OROEDU bank account and confirm by sending a screenshot of your transfer to @oroedubot on Telegram. Your booking will be fully confirmed after admin approval and payment verification.
errorSubmittingBooking: Error submitting booking. Please try again.
itemNotFound: The requested item could not be found.
pleaseSelectSectionsToBook: Please select one or more sections to book.

errorSavingBooking: Error saving booking information. Please try again.
couldNotCalculatePrice: Could not calculate the price. Please check item details.
tagline: Your premier destination for comfortable dormitory stays and versatile hall rentals.
languagesSupported: Available in English, Oromo, and Amharic.
powerfulManagement: Powerful admin panel for seamless control.
pageNotFoundMessage: Oops! The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
enterCredentialsToAccessAccount: Enter your credentials to access your account.
invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
companyRegistrationDescription: Register your company to book our facilities.
registrationSubmittedMessage: Your company registration has been submitted and is pending approval. You will be notified once it's processed.
emailAlreadyInUseError: This email address is already in use. Please try another one.

errorProcessingBooking: There was an error processing your booking. Please contact support.
yourBookingRequestHasBeenProcessed: Your booking request has been processed. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you! Your booking request for the facility has been received and will be reviewed by our team. We will get back to you soon.
enterPhoneNumberToFindBooking: Enter your phone number to find your dormitory bookings.
noBookingsFoundForPhone: No approved dormitory bookings found for this phone number.
errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for bookings. Please try again.
dormitoryIdMissing: Dormitory ID is missing from the request.
noAvailabilityData: No availability data found for this dormitory.
paymentInstructions: Please use the following bank details to make your payment for booking ID: {bookingId}.
paymentReferenceNote: Important: Please use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference or description.
uploadProofDescription: After making the payment, please upload a screenshot or photo of your payment confirmation.
paymentProofSubmittedDesc: Your payment proof has been submitted. We will verify it shortly and confirm your booking.
errorUploadingProof: Error uploading payment proof. Please try again.
fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload an image (JPG, PNG) or PDF.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Incomplete booking confirmation details. Please contact support if this issue persists.
registerAdminDescription: Create a new administrator account. This action is restricted to superadmins.
adminRegisteredMessage: Admin account for {email} has been successfully created.
superAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible only by Super Administrators.
updateYourProfileDetails: Update your profile details and password.
yourBookingsDescription: View and manage your facility bookings.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyDashboard: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to view this dashboard.
registrationPendingMessage: Your company registration is currently pending approval. We will notify you once it's reviewed.
registrationRejectedMessage: We regret to inform you that your company registration has been rejected. Please contact support for more information.
contactSupportForAssistance: Please contact support for further assistance.
statusUnknownMessage: There was an issue determining your account status. Please contact support.
agreementNotAvailableForBooking: An agreement is not applicable or ready for this type of booking or its current status.
enterCustomTermsHere: Enter any custom terms or modifications here. These will be appended to or replace parts of the standard agreement.
editTermsNote: These terms will be reflected in the printable agreement. Ensure they comply with legal standards.
termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due upon signing this agreement unless otherwise specified.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation: Cancellations made less than 72 hours before the booking start date are subject to a 50% cancellation fee. Cancellations within 24 hours are non-refundable.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Use of Facility: The client agrees to use the facility only for the purpose stated in the booking and to leave the facility in a clean and orderly condition.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Damages: The client is responsible for any damages to the facility or equipment caused by the client or their attendees during the rental period.
agreementNotApplicable: Agreement is not applicable for this booking.
selectDateRangeForReports: Select a date range to generate reports.
selectReportTypeAndDateRange: Select a report type. Ensure a date range is chosen above.
viewOrPrintDormitoryBookingData: View or print specific dormitory booking data.
selectDateRangeFirst: Please select a date range first.
noDataForReport: No data available for this report and selected period.
individualUserNote: Individual users can book dormitories directly without company registration.
phoneForTelegramIdentification: Used for payment proof via Telegram. Must be your Telegram number.
phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: Optional. If provided, can be used for Telegram communication.
enterAccountNumber: Enter your bank account number for the transfer
completeYourPaymentDescription: Follow the instructions below to complete your booking payment.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After making the transfer, please send a screenshot of your payment confirmation to our Telegram bot: {botUsername}, along with your phone number: {phoneNumber}.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: After sending proof, our admin will verify your payment and confirm your booking.
missingBookingId: Booking ID is missing. Cannot proceed with payment details.
paymentNotExpectedOrAlreadyProcessed: Payment is not currently expected for this booking, or it has already been processed.
noBookingsMatchSearch: No bookings match your search criteria.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page is no longer in use. Please navigate using the main menu.

itemNotAvailableError: {itemName} is currently not available for booking.
errorFetchingItemDetails: Error fetching item details. Please try again.

dormitoryBedsUnavailable: All beds in {roomName} are already booked for the selected dates or part of them.
errorCheckingAvailability: An error occurred while checking availability.
facilityNotAvailableOverride: Facility '{itemName}' is currently marked as unavailable by administration.
itemUnavailableConflict: Facility '{itemName}' is already booked or has conflicting bookings for the selected dates or part of them.
errorCheckingExistingBookings: An error occurred while checking for existing bookings. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
firestorePermissionError: A database permission error occurred. Please contact support.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: The database requires a specific configuration (index) to perform this check. Please contact support or ask an administrator to check the Firebase console for index creation instructions related to booking queries.
duplicateBookingForPhoneOnDateError: Sorry, you cannot book twice with the same phone number for the same start date. A booking already exists or is pending for this phone number on the selected start date.
searchCompanies: Search by company name, contact, or email...
viewAndApproveCompanies: View company registrations and manage their approval status.
companyStatusUpdated: Approval status for company ({companyId}) set to {status}.
adminOrSuperAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible only by Administrators or Super Administrators.

duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: Duplicate booking check was skipped due to a database configuration issue. Your booking will be submitted, but duplicates might occur. Admin will review. Please create the required Firestore index.
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: Your payment proof has been submitted via Telegram and is now awaiting verification by our team. We will update you once it's processed.
bankDetailsForPaymentVerification: Use these details for payment verification or to provide to clients.
adminPaymentReferenceNote: Clients should use their Booking ID as a reference when making payments.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as an authorized company representative to view this agreement.
accessDeniedViewAgreement: Access Denied: You do not have permission to view this booking agreement.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: This agreement is not yet ready for viewing or has not been sent to you.
